name: Captain Sparkles' Infinite Space Adventure
description:
Hi there!

We are Róbert Fekete (Game Designer) and Amparo Fernández (Digital Artist and Illustrator) and we created a game about Sparkles, a cat who dreamt of travelling to the Milky-way since he was kitten. After he collected the necessary materials, he built a special space suit and took it upon himself to fulfil his dreams. 

Controls: 
LEFT ARROW: Move LEFT
RIGHT ARROW: Move RIGHT

The objective of the game is to go as high as possible and get points for evading enemies.  The higher you go the more obstacles you will find. 
I hope you enjoy and keep in mind that this is still a BETA.
